page.title: 12BUSSAGE NEAR CHALFORD
page.content: In the village of Bussage there is a new primary school for the children under eleven.There is also a doctor's surgery where people go for treatment and medical advice if they are ill. Near the surgery is a Post Office. There two garages in the village,both of which service vehicles,and there is a coach touring company.Bussage has a public playing field and two public houses.The village has four places of worship. There is only one bus service which provides thirteen buses a day.On the Toadsmoor side of the village there is a timber yard. There is also a residential area called Frithwood and a modern housing development at Manor Farm.The village also has a general stores.
